Key Match Events: England won 2-1 against Slovakia in the Euro 2024 Round of 16
Pre-Game Insights: Phil Foden will return to England's training camp in Germany ahead of Sunday's Euro 2024 last-16 clash with Slovakia
Foden's position on the left flank has been questioned
Southgate may consider starting Foden in his favoured number 10 role, which could see Jude Bellingham move into a deeper role or drop out of the side
Post-Match Reflections: England helped equal an unwanted Euros record with their win over Slovakia
The Three Lions have flattered to deceive in Germany thus far, picking up five points and scoring only two goals in three group games
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's last-16 plans were hampered by Foden's departure
The match was played at the Arena AufSchalke in Gelsenkirchen
Others: England's starting lineup for the match was not disclosed
Foden's return to the England squad is a timely boost ahead of Sunday's contest
